column4: hello, im having a problem and im not sure if it is ubuntu or the computer but basically when ubuntu install disk boots up all the way the computer shuts off or sometimes it happens during the boot process, if someone is able to give there input on this, that would be very much appreciated
anyone here that could help me?
but don't repeat yourself too fast
and the description sounds more like a problem w/ hardware (temperature, PSU, RAM..)
